AAP.caption: Follow Position
AAP.doc: Ensure the Group Focus always follows the position of the reference element (on scroll).
AAP.name: follow_position

AAQ.caption: Placement Optimizer
AAQ.doc: Choose a placement adjusting method to re-align the group focus.
AAQ.name: placement_optimizer

AAR.caption: Autohide
AAR.doc: Hide the Group Focus when either the GF itself or the reference is scrolled out of view (out of a table)
AAR.name: hide

AAV.caption: Main Axis Offset
AAV.doc: Vertical offset for 'top' and 'bottom' placements; Horizontal offset for 'left' and 'right' placements
AAV.name: offset_main_axis

AAW.caption: Cross Axis Offset
AAW.doc: Horizontal offset for 'top' and 'bottom' placements; Vertical offset for 'left' and 'right' placements
AAW.name: offset_cross_axis

AAX.caption: For top/bottom placement, Main Axis = Vertical, and Cross Axis = Horizontal
AAX.name: axis_guide_1

AAY.caption: For left/right placement, Main Axis = Horizontal, and Cross Axis = Vertical
AAY.name: axis_guide_2

AAZ.caption: Flip will flip the Group Focus on the opposite the default placement to keep it in view.
AAZ.name: placement_optimizer_guide_1

AAa.caption: Shift will shift the Group Focus to keep it in view.
AAa.name: shift_guide_1

AAb.caption: Aggressive Shift is similar shift, but on both axis. May cause the Group Focus to overlap or be detached from the Reference element.
AAb.name: shift_guide_2

AAc.caption: Auto Placement will move the Group Focus to the placement with most space available.
AAc.name: placement_optimizer_guide_4

AAd.caption: Shift Option
AAd.doc: Choose a shifting method to keep the Group Focus in view.
AAd.name: shift_type

AAe.caption: Animate Placement Change
AAe.doc: If you use a Placement Optimizer, checking this option will animate the placement change. Consider turning this off if performance is affected.
AAe.name: animate_placement

AAf.caption: Animate Appearance
AAf.doc: This option will animate the appearance of the Group Focus by Fading. Will be played upon first display and auto-hide/show. Consider turning this off if performance is affected.
AAf.name: animate_appearance
